title: Update regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors (VELO) has announced the appointment of Dr. Maria Rodriguez as the new Head of Powertrain Development, effective immediately. Dr. Rodriguez, a renowned expert in internal combustion engine design, joins VELO from a leading automotive research institution, where she oversaw the development of several high-performance engine architectures.

In marketing news, VELO has launched a new social media campaign, #VelocityUnleashed, aimed at showcasing the company's high-performance vehicle portfolio. The campaign features a series of technical deep dives, highlighting the engineering prowess behind VELO's flagship models, including the VELO Raptor and VELO Vortex.

On the ESG front, VELO has published its annual Sustainability Report, detailing the company's progress towards reducing its carbon footprint and improving supply chain transparency. Key highlights include a 12% reduction in manufacturing emissions, achieved through the implementation of energy-efficient production processes, and the introduction of a new supplier code of conduct, aligning with industry-leading standards for human rights and environmental responsibility.

Additionally, VELO has announced a partnership with the Society of Automotive Engineers (SAE) to support the development of industry-wide standards for electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure. As part of this collaboration, VELO will provide technical expertise and resources to help drive the adoption of interoperable EV charging solutions.

In other news, VELO has confirmed that its 2023 Annual General Meeting (AGM) will be held on May 15, 2023, at the company's headquarters in Detroit, Michigan. Shareholders are invited to attend and participate in the meeting, which will include a presentation on the company's financial performance and strategic outlook.
